## Welcome to JupyterLite Integration

This document demonstrates how to embed a full JupyterLite environment in your Quarto website.

### Embedded JupyterLite REPL

The following iframe embeds a live Python REPL powered by JupyterLite:

<iframe 
  src="https://jupyterlite.github.io/demo/repl/index.html?kernel=python&toolbar=1" 
  width="100%" 
  height="600px"
  style="border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px;">
</iframe>

### Full JupyterLab Interface

For a complete notebook experience, you can embed the full JupyterLab interface:

<iframe 
  src="https://jupyterlite.github.io/demo/lab/index.html" 
  width="100%" 
  height="700px"
  style="border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px;">
</iframe>

### Usage Instructions

1. **REPL Mode**: Use the first embed for quick Python code execution and testing
2. **Full Lab Mode**: Use the second embed for complete notebook functionality
3. **Packages Available**: Includes NumPy, Pandas, Matplotlib, Plotly, and more via Pyodide

### Custom JupyterLite Deployment

If you want to use your own JupyterLite deployment, simply replace the `src` URL:

<iframe 
  src="YOUR_JUPYTERLITE_URL_HERE/repl/index.html?kernel=python" 
  width="100%" 
  height="600px"
  style="border: 1px solid #ccc; border-radius: 4px;">
</iframe>
